vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Κυρήνιος
(prop. -ίνιος, see Bl., 13; -ῖνος L, -εῖνος, Tr., WH, mg.), -ου, ὁ,
Quirinus, prop. Quirinius: Luk.2:2.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Luk.2.2
§ Quirinius
Cyrenius, (perhaps Quirinus) (Proper name), the governor of Syria, Lk. 2:2*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
居里扭 这个陽性專有名詞在拉丁文的意思是 "勇士"
敘利亞的總督, 與新約聖經裡記載的人口普查有關 (路 2:2)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
居里扭 这个阳性专有名词在拉丁文的意思是 "勇士"
叙利亚的总督, 与新约圣经里记载的人口普查有关 (路 2:2)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Qui-ri-ni-u: theo cách gọi của người La-mã, ông nầy có ba tên là Publius Sulpicius Quirinius.
